name: Tempo (itch)
description:
Tempo is a puzzle/adventure game that provides challenges based around the linear passage of time. The player must observe the environment around him and perceive how it changes throughout the cycles of day and night to solve the challenges ahead. Inspired by games like Fez and Journey, the objective is to create a virtual space and an aesthetic experience that feels good to explore and get lost in.

Keyboard Controls:

  • WASD: Movement
  • E: Interacting
  • SPACE: Speed up Time
  • F: Fullscreen
  • ESC: Restart

Xbox Controller:

  • Left analog Stick: Movement
  • A: Interacting
  • Right Trigger: Speed up time
  • Back: Restart

Music by Incompetech

Fresh Air Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Hello there! My name is André Rache and this is my first game: Tempo. It was created while I was studying Digital Media Design at PUC-RIO University, in Brazil. I hope you enjoy this very short prototype, and I appreciate and welcome absolutely any sort of feedback. Thank you!
